Key Match Events: South Africa scored 399-7, their highest total in a World Cup match
England scored 170, their lowest total in a World Cup match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Reece Topley suffered an injury during the match
Others: England lost three wickets inside the first 12 overs
Adil Rashid was uncomfortable throughout the match due to a stomach upset
Heinrich Klaasen scored a brutal and brave century for South Africa
Marco Jansen scored 75 off 42 balls in the final overs
